Index.title: Defining the Infrastructure for the AGI Era
Index.subtitle: An era where everyone can own their AI. Nextain provides interoperable architecture support to easily and securely deploy 'Your Own AI' and 'Your Organization's AI'.

products_section.title: The Anchor in Fragmentation
products_section.desc: In an era of endless software variations, Nextain provides the common standard that allows all these creations to coexist securely.

naia.slogan: Your AI lives here. Your OS, your rules.
naia.f1: Your own AI with customizable VRM 3D avatars
naia.f2: Freedom of AI choice (Gemini, Claude, GPT, Ollama, etc.)
naia.f3: Give your AI a unique voice with various TTS engines
naia.f4: The entire OS as a tool: files, terminal, browser, and more
naia.f5: Complete local control over memory and personality on your machine
naia.f6: 70+ built-in skills and OpenClaw community ecosystem
naia.f7: Stay connected via Discord DM anywhere, anytime
naia.f8: Always-on AI powered by the OpenClaw gateway running 24/7
naia.f9: Fully open source (Apache 2.0) for transparent data handling
naia.f10: Gaming OS + AI vision built on Bazzite and Steam/Proton

jikime.slogan: Agent Technology for Enterprise AX Migration
jikime.f1: Enterprise AX agents that transform legacy code into modern, AI-collaborative foundations
jikime.f2: Security-first validation of AI-generated code and real-time runtime protection
jikime.f3: Providing cloud and on-premise AI agent infrastructure for continuous improvement and secure operation

philosophy_section.title: Built on Openness, Driven by Technical Excellence

p1.title: Upstream First
p1.desc: We contribute to open-source communities first. Through a dual-license model — AI context (.agents/) under CC-BY-SA 4.0 and source code under Apache 2.0 — we propose a new contribution infrastructure that keeps the open source ecosystem sustainable in the vibe coding era.

p2.title: Data-Driven Transparency
p2.desc: All Nextain technical decisions are based on transparent data and logic, providing our partners and customers with a predictable and reliable development environment.

p3.title: Robust AI Infrastructure
p3.desc: We focus on solving the security and system fragmentation challenges enterprises face when adopting AI, building a sustainable infrastructure ecosystem.

team_section.synergy: Problem solvers who deliver 10x productivity through AI vibe coding, regardless of domain.

insight.title: The Era of Vibe Coding: AI for Everyone
insight.desc: Open source enabled vibe coding, but vibe coding must not destroy the open source ecosystem that made it possible. As AI generates more code, the vessel that holds it must be even more solid and open. Nextain proposes a dual-license model that protects AI context (.agents/) as intellectual property while keeping it open source. An architecture where AI agents themselves attribute sources, suggest voluntary donations, and sustain the open source ecosystem — this is our vision for a sustainable AI era.
insight.author: - Luke, Founder of Nextain

footer.desc: Nextain INC is a tech company building open, interoperable AI environments.

cover.title:
Your AI lives here.
Your OS, your rules.
cover.subtitle: An AI operating system that gives individuals sovereignty — your own AI avatar, your own data, your own device.

problem.label: PROBLEM
problem.title: The AI Sovereignty Crisis
problem.subtitle: Your AI is not yours
problem.p1_desc: Locked into single platforms like ChatGPT or Copilot. Switching means losing all memory, personality, and settings.
problem.p2_desc: Conversations, work data, and personal preferences stored on big tech clouds. Users don't even have deletion rights.
problem.p3_desc: AI limited to text chatbots. No custom voice, emotional expression, or avatar personalization — disposable tools.

solution.label: SOLUTION
solution.title: Naia OS
solution.slogan: Your AI lives here, on your OS
solution.desc: Three open-source layers form a single AI operating system.
solution.c1_desc: Tauri 2 desktop app. VRM 3D avatar, voice conversation, emotional expression. The interface where users meet their AI.
solution.c2_desc: 24/7 gateway embracing the open-source AI agent ecosystem. 5,700+ community skills, multi-LLM, memory, tool execution.
solution.c3_desc: Immutable OS based on Fedora Atomic, like SteamOS. Rock-solid stability through updates. AAA gaming with Steam/Proton.
solution.f1: Freedom of AI choice — 7 cloud providers + Ollama local AI
solution.f2: Complete local control — memory, personality, chat history all on your PC
solution.f3: One Nextain account to manage credits, devices, and settings

product.label: PRODUCT
product.title: Product Demo
product.app_desc: Tauri 2-based desktop app. Chat with your 3D avatar and automate tasks with 70+ skills.

ecosystem.label: ECOSYSTEM
ecosystem.title: Open-Source Ecosystem
ecosystem.e1_desc: Weather, GitHub, Slack, Spotify, Discord and more — 70 built-in skills + ClawHub 5,700+ community skills. Add freely or build your own.
ecosystem.e2_desc: OpenClaw gateway runs in the background 24/7. Even when the app is closed, your AI stays alive — receiving messages and executing tasks.
ecosystem.e3_desc: Dual-license protection: code (Apache 2.0) and AI context (CC-BY-SA 4.0). A contribution infrastructure designed so AI agents recognize and comply with licenses on their own.
ecosystem.highlight_title: Upstream First — Open Source in the Vibe Coding Era
ecosystem.highlight_quote: "Open source enabled vibe coding, but vibe coding must not destroy the open source ecosystem."
ecosystem.highlight_desc: AI context (.agents/) shared under CC-BY-SA 4.0, source code under Apache 2.0 — a dual-license model. AI agents that attribute sources, comply with licenses, and guide voluntary sponsorship — a new architecture sustaining the open-source ecosystem.
